front.title: DHCP option for NSH in Service Function Path (SFP)

abstract.t: This draft specifies Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol option (both DHCPv4 and DHCPv6) for NSH aware clients participating in the service function path(SFP) of the service chaining. As part of this proposal SFF and SF will receive the SFP information containing Service Path Identifier(SPI), Transport protocol and Nexthop(NH) address of subsequent SFF/SF.
